meanings.definition: An antibiotic drug obtained from penicillium molds, used to treat various bacterial infections.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed penicillin to cure the infection.
meanings.sent2: She took penicillin three times a day to fight the bacteria.
meanings.sent3: The bacteria were scared of the penicillin army marching in.
meanings.sent4: Penicillin was like a superhero fighting off the evil bacteria invaders.
meanings.sent5: The penicillin worked like a shield, protecting the body from harm.
